mapper.insert: insert into p_information (p_date, p_form, p_status, r_id ) values(#{p_date},#{p_form},#{p_status}, #{r_id})
mapper.update: update p_information set p_date = #{p_date}, p_form=${p_form}, p_status=${p_status} where p_id = #{p_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM p_information p JOIN register r ON r.r_id = p.r_id JOIN class c ON r.class_name = c.class_name JOIN student s ON r.s_id = s.s_id JOIN teacher t ON c.t_id = t.t_id WHERE p.p_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND s.s_id = #{s_id}
